name: The Chronicles of Flimbert Flibbinbotham
description:
A speedrunning game about a penguin.

Play through 3 playable stages and try to achieve the best time possible!

Controls (Keyboard):

A/D/Arrows - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Attack

Right Click - Dash

R - Restart Level

[/] - Change Level

P - Reset Best Time

Controls (XBOX/Playstation):
D-Pad/Left Stick - Move

A/X - Jump

X/Square - Attack

RB/R1 - Dash

LB/L1 - Restart Level

Right Stick - Change Level

Right Stick Click - Reset Best Time
